adDetails: Dj Sir-C The most RELIABLE, EXPERIENCED, OUTGOING, ENERGETIC and PROFESSIONAL DJ for any special occasion. -House Parties -Private Parties -Weddings -Birthday Parties -Quinceaneras -Corporate Events/Parties -Holiday Parties -Bollywood-etc. I have over 5 years of professional Dj'ing experience. From school events such as, back-to-school dances, proms, and formals, to weddings; I always get outstanding reviews. Perfect for birthday parties and corporate events. A few things that seperate me from other Dj's around town: -Amazing crowd-engaging microphone performances. -Energetic, young, and fun! -I use top-of-the-line equipment and modern day technology that allows for better organization, smooth mixing, and quality sound. -Very well experienced with ANY type of event. -I offer unbeatable prices for the professional service I provide. -I have a love and passion for what I do. -Very reliable and always on time. From club lighting to wireless microphones, I will make your event happen! Party packages start as low as $200 and vary depending on a few factors, such as: -size of the event/crowd -type of event -duration of Dj services -equipment used Call me DJ Sir-C at show contact info for more info, as well as booking. Please leave a message if I don't pick-up and I will return your call as soon as possible. I look forward to your business, thank you for looking.
